short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly get Grok AI to explain any tweet with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Grok Tweet Explainer lets you instantly understand any tweet using Grok AI. With a single click, get clear explanations of tweets, including context, references, and hidden meanings.

Free to use:
this is a free chrome extension. 
I don't feel right charing for this when you've already paid to X/Twitter.
If you want to support this project buy me a pizza: buymeacoffee(dot)com/alicodermaker

â€¢ Works with Grok AI's advanced language understanding
â€¢ Simple, intuitive interface with zero configuration needed

Perfect for:
â€¢ Understanding complex threads
â€¢ Getting context for viral tweets
â€¢ Decoding industry jargon and tech talk
â€¢ Understanding cultural references and memes

How it works:
1. Find any tweet you want explained
2. Click the Grok button (ðŸ¤–) next to the tweet
3. Get instant AI-powered explanations from Grok

Note: Requires a Grok-enabled X Premium+ subscription to use the explanation feature.

Privacy focused: This extension only interacts with Twitter/X and Grok. No user data is collected or stored.
